name: AX Consultants
tagline: What we are. Pure and Simple.
description:
AX Consultants is a specialized consulting firm focused intently on Dynamics AX. True senior level AX consultants with significant experience implementing AX over many years. Our history includes working with large Microsoft partners, global implementations, small and medium sized regional implementations, and various implementation methodologies. All with great success.
We can mitigate a client's implementation risks by leveraging our experience and expertise in Dynamics AX to ensure a first time successful on-time and on-budget deployment of AX. We also can educate a client's internal team in AX to enable the necessary application independence most companies are looking for.
AX Consultants has additionally developed a successful track-record assisting companies that might find themselves challenged during an implementation, have gone live with Dynamics AX but are not seeing the results they desire, desire to upgrade or just need to make some improvements. We can effectively evaluate issues, propose realistic solutions and allow companies to quickly start benefiting from their Dynamics AX investment.
AX Consultants specializes in document and labeling output. With Create!form, from Bottomline Technologies, companies can create outstanding customer-facing documents. Our AXLabel solution allows item product labels to be created directly from Dynamics AX. Label information is configured to create labels using the Bartender labeling solution.
